channel.title: Labs on QuizIt
channel.description: Recent content in Labs on QuizIt

item.title: Combining Like Terms
item.description: Mathematics Skill Enhancement Tool for Primary and Secondary School Students. Secondary School, Middle School, High School. Polynomial Operations, Combining Like Terms, Factoring. Automatic Question Generation, Error Correction

item.title: Math Master
item.description: Mathematical Skills Support Tool for Elementary and Middle School Students. Suitable for Preschoolers, Elementary School Students, and Middle School Students. Operations within 10 for Addition and Subtraction, within 100 for Addition and Subtraction, Multiplication and Division. Fraction and Decimal Operations, Mixed Operations, Simple Calculations, Automatic Question Generation.

item.title: 运算大师
item.description: 年级 10以内 100以内 乘除 小数&分数 有理数 题量 1 3 5 10 难度 单项 多项 新题 答案 可回车或空格切换输入框/切换题目
